sentence.Network_en: They may grant you power, honour, and riches but afflict you with servitude, infamy, and poverty.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们可以给你权力 、 荣誉和财富,但却用奴役 、 耻辱和贫穷来折磨你.

sentence.Network_en: The criminal was sentenced to five years'servitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 这犯人被判处五年劳役.

sentence.Network_en: The essay exhorts women to cast off their servitude to husbands and priests.
sentence.Network_cn: 该文劝告女性不要再对丈夫和牧师低三下四。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... serviceable a 有用的；便利的 servitude n 奴役 servant n 仆人；公务员.
“尔巴代提”意指劳役(Servitude)。一、“迪尼”的意义假如你听命于某人,承认他是你的领导,这就表示说,你接受了他的“迪尼”,你顺服了他。于是他就是你的.
法律英语词汇-青青岛社区 ... 地上权 superficies 地役权 servitude;easement 人役权 servitus personarum;personal servitude.
[1]相对于“女人”在社会关系上被男人宰制,女同性恋至少在性实践方面逃脱了此种奴隶状态(servitude),它是一个超乎男女性别的概念。[2] 在这样的情势下,女性唯一.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin servitudo, from servus 'slave'

entry.tran: 奴役;苦役;完全受人支配
entry.def: Servitude is the condition of being a slave or of being completely under the control of someone else.

means.word_mean: 1. state of subjection to an owner or master or forced labor imposed as punishment;

auth_sentence.content: Unjustly thou deprav'st it with the name Of Servitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unjustly thou deprav'st it with the name Of Servitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unjustly thou deprav'st it with the name Of Servitude.

auth_sentence.content: He kept the name of servitude shining bright.
auth_sentence.res_content: He kept the name of servitude shining bright.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He kept the name of servitude shining bright.

auth_sentence.content: Gratitude was just another kind of servitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gratitude was just another kind of servitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gratitude was just another kind of servitude.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害
